00001 /******************************************************************************
00002 * File      : comFilter.c                                                     *
00003 * Author    : Carlos Rosales Fernandez (carlos@ihpc.a-star.edu.sg)            *
00004 * Date      : 01-09-2006                                                      *
00005 * Revision  : 1.0                                                             *
00006 *******************************************************************************
00007 * DESCRIPTION                                                                 *
00008 * Receives the name of the input file and filters out all C++ style comments, *
00009 * then creates uncommented file filename.tmp. Input file is not changed.      *
00010 ******************************************************************************/

00035 #include <stdlib.h>
00036 #include <stdio.h>
00037 #include <string.h>
00038 
00039 #define LINELENGTH 320
00040 
00041 void comFilter(char *FileName)
00042 {
00043     FILE *fIn, *fOut;
00044     char cTest[LINELENGTH];
00045     int  i;
00046 
00047     if((fIn = fopen(FileName,"r")) != NULL){   
00048         if((fOut = fopen(strcat(FileName,".tmp"),"w")) != NULL){
00049             while(fgets(cTest,LINELENGTH,fIn) != NULL){
00050                 for(i = 0; i < strlen(cTest); i++)
00051                     if((cTest[i] == '/') && cTest[i+1] == '/'){
00052                         if(i ==0) cTest[i]='\0';
00053                         else{
00054                             cTest[i]='\n';
00055                             cTest[i+1]='\0';
00056                         }
00057                     break;
00058                     }
00059                 if(strlen(cTest) > 0) fprintf(fOut,"%s",cTest);
00060             }
00061         }
00062         else{
00063             printf("ERROR: Can't create output file %s.\n", FileName);
00064             exit(1);
00065         }
00066     }
00067     else{
00068         printf("ERROR: Can't open input file %s.\n", FileName);
00069         exit(1);
00070     }
00071 
00072     fclose(fIn);
00073     fclose(fOut);
00074 }
